titles.title: Commending Russ Meyer on his induction into the National Aviation Hall of Fame.
Commending Russ Meyer on his induction into the National Aviation Hall of Fame.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 111-282.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 114.

action.text: Mr. Costello moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 719.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the House on October 6, 2009. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends Russ Meyer for being inducted into the National Aviation Hall of Fame.
Recognizes the achievements of Russ Meyer during his lifetime of service to the aviation industry.
